title: Harmonic Sequence
code:
§begin music_gen
  notes ← [262, 294, 330, 349, 392, 440, 494, 523]
  harmony ← §create_array
  §iterate freq §in notes
    §transmit freq
  §end_iterate
§end
solution_description: outputs a sequence of frequencies representing musical notes (C major scale)
hints: These numbers represent sound frequencies in Hz
This is the C major scale: C, D, E, F, G, A, B, C
The aliens encoded music as data
